Projects

Selected projects from our research program.

Learned indexes with Machine Learning

ML models approximate data distributions to replace traditional indexes with faster retrieval and lower memory.

Database performance tuning with Multi-armed Bandits

Automated physical design tuning for ad hoc workloads, with statistical guarantees on design quality.

Data-driven traffic flow optimization with Reinforcement Learning

Algorithms for ride-sharing dispatch and road network configuration that reduce congestion and wait time.

Improving data quality through domain-driven imputation

Use spatial and domain properties to impute missing values and improve real-world data reliability.

Cheap data analysis with Skipper

Cold-storage query processing with cache management and I/O scheduling to cut analytics cost.

Predictable query performance with Smooth Scan

Runtime morphing between access paths to avoid bad plans and stabilize performance.

Fast data exploration with NoDB

Query raw files without loading; build indexes and caches incrementally from query feedback.
